title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
description: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail.

title: Airplane!
director: Jim Abrahams, David Zucker, Jerry Zucker
description: After the crew becomes sick with food poisoning, a neurotic ex-fighter pilot must safely land a commercial airplane.

title: Blazing Saddles
description: A corrupt politician appoints a black sheriff, who promptly becomes his most formidable adversary.

title: Caddyshack
description: An exclusive golf course has to deal with a flatulent new member and a destructive dancing gopher.

title: Dr. Strangelove
description: A mentally unstable American general orders a hydrogen bomb attack on the Soviet Union.

title: Annie Hall
description: A divorced Jewish comedian reflects on his relationship with ex-lover Annie Hall.

title: The Jerk
description: A simpleminded, sheltered country boy suddenly decides to leave his family home to experience life in the big city.

title: The Blues Brothers
description: Jake Blues rejoins his brother Elwood to reunite their old R&B band and save the Catholic home.

title: Young Frankenstein
description: An American grandson of the infamous scientist discovers the process that reanimates a dead body.

title: Dumb and Dumber
description: A dumb limo driver and his dumber friend set out on a hilarious cross-country road trip to Aspen.

title: National Lampoon's Animal House
description: Dean Vernon Wormer is determined to expel the entire Delta Tau Chi Fraternity.

title: Office Space
description: Three company workers who hate their jobs decide to rebel against their greedy boss.

title: The Big Lebowski
description: Jeff 'The Dude' Lebowski seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help.

title: Spaceballs
description: A star-pilot for hire must rescue a princess and save Planet Druidia from the evil Spaceballs.

title: The Naked Gun
description: Incompetent police Detective Frank Drebin must foil an attempt to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II.

title: Planes, Trains & Automobiles
description: A Chicago advertising man must struggle to travel home from New York for Thanksgiving.

title: Clerks
description: A day in the lives of two convenience clerks named Dante and Randal as they annoy customers.

title: Superbad
description: Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety.

title: The Hangover
description: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas with no memory of the previous night.

title: The 40-Year-Old Virgin
description: A nerdy guy who's never 'done the deed' finds the pressure mounting when he meets a single mother.

title: Old School
description: Three friends attempt to recapture their glory days by opening up a fraternity.

title: American Pie
description: Four teenage boys enter a pact to lose their virginity by prom night.

title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
description: A group of misfits enter a Las Vegas dodgeball tournament to save their local gym.

title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
description: An anchorman's stint as San Diego's top-rated newsreader is challenged by an ambitious newswoman.

title: Borat
description: Kazakh TV talking head Borat is dispatched to the United States to report on the greatest country.

title: Happy Gilmore
description: A bad tempered hockey player takes his talents to golf to get his grandmother's house back.

title: Ted
description: A man must decide between keeping his relationship with his teddy bear Ted or his girlfriend.

title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
description: A brash high school senior is determined to enjoy an epic day roaring around Chicago.

title: Step Brothers
description: Two aimless middle-aged losers are forced to become roommates when their parents marry.

title: Wedding Crashers
description: A pair of committed womanizers sneak into weddings to take advantage of the romantic atmosphere.

title: Knocked Up
description: A one-night stand shows up eight weeks later to tell Ben she's pregnant with his child.

title: Horrible Bosses
description: Three friends conspire to murder their awful bosses.

title: Shaun of the Dead
description: A London electronics salesman's life is disrupted by the zombie apocalypse.

title: Hot Fuzz
description: An overachieving London police sergeant is transferred to a village with grisly murders.

title: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
description: A New York thief is sent to Hollywood to train under a private eye for a movie role.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
description: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel.

title: Deadpool
description: A wisecracking mercenary becomes immortal yet hideously scarred.

title: We're the Millers
description: A pot dealer creates a fake family to move a huge shipment of weed from Mexico.

title: Zombieland
description: A shy student and friends join forces in a trek across zombie-filled America.

title: This Is the End
description: Six Los Angeles celebrities are stuck in James Franco's house during the apocalypse.

title: Moonrise Kingdom
description: Two 12-year-olds fall in love and elope into the wilderness.

title: EuroTrip
description: A high school grad decides to embark on an overseas adventure in Europe.

title: Ghostbusters
description: Three paranormal scientists start a ghostbusting business in New York.

title: Coming to America
description: An African prince travels to America to find a bride.

title: Beverly Hills Cop
description: A freewheeling Detroit cop pursues a murder case in Beverly Hills.

title: Groundhog Day
description: A weatherman finds himself in a time loop on Groundhog Day.

title: The Truman Show
description: An insurance salesman suspects his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

title: Liar Liar
description: A lawyer finds himself unable to lie for 24 hours.

title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
description: A goofy detective specializing in animals goes in search of a missing mascot.

title: Bruce Almighty
description: A whiny news reporter is given the chance to step into God's shoes.

title: Meet the Parents
description: A male nurse meets his girlfriend's parents before proposing marriage.

title: There's Something About Mary
description: A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from high school.

title: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery
description: A 1960s hipster secret agent is brought out of cryofreeze to oppose his nemesis.

title: Zoolander
description: A dim-witted male model is brainwashed to kill the Prime Minister of Malaysia.

title: Napoleon Dynamite
description: A listless and alienated teenager decides to help his new friend win the class presidency.

title: Talladega Nights
description: Number one NASCAR driver Ricky Bobby stays atop the heap thanks to a pact with his best friend.

title: Elf
description: A man raised as an elf at the North Pole is sent to the U.S. in search of his true identity.

title: School of Rock
description: A struggling musician poses as a substitute teacher at a prestigious prep school.

title: Pineapple Express
description: A process server and his marijuana dealer wind up on the run from hitmen.

title: Tropic Thunder
description: A group of self-absorbed actors set out to make the most expensive war film.

title: Role Models
description: Wild behavior forces a pair of energy drink reps to enroll in a Big Brother program.

title: I Love You, Man
description: A man in need of a best man for his wedding seeks out a male friend.

title: Forgetting Sarah Marshall
description: A musician's life spirals out of control when his TV star girlfriend leaves him.

title: Get Him to the Greek
description: A record company intern must get an unruly rock star to Los Angeles for a concert.

title: The Other Guys
description: Two mismatched New York City detectives seize an opportunity to step up.

title: Due Date
description: A high-strung father-to-be is forced to hitch a ride with an aspiring actor.

title: The Heat
description: An uptight FBI agent is paired with a foul-mouthed Boston cop.

title: 21 Jump Street
description: Two underachieving cops are sent back to a local high school to blend in and investigate.

title: 22 Jump Street
description: The Jump Street cops go undercover at a local college.

title: Neighbors
description: A couple with a newborn baby face unexpected difficulties when they are forced to live next to a fraternity house.

title: Game Night
description: A group of friends who meet regularly for game nights find themselves in a real-life mystery.

title: Booksmart
description: Two academic teenage superstars realize they should have worked less and played more.

title: Knives Out
description: A detective investigates the death of a patriarch of an eccentric, combative family.

title: Palm Springs
description: Two strangers get stuck in a time loop and must repeat the same day over and over.
